description: The apartment is located in the heart of Crown Heights and on the ground floor of a residential building with three other units. There are 2 bedrooms with full size beds and an air mattress & couch available for use. Crown Heights is full of great restaurants, bars and shopping. Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, Brooklyn Museum, and the Brooklyn Public Library are all a short walk away. This place is short walk to A/C/2/3, making it easy to get into the city.
name: Hidden Gem in Crown Heights
